oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Visual monitoring of landscapes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Heikkilä, Tapio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Landscape and recreation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The study began in 1996 with an initial documentation of 13 agricultural landscape sites in different parts of Finland. The vantage points were selected from each area based on a map survey.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Heikkilä, Tapio (2009) Visual monitoring of landscapes. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, p. 26.
